text:
December 5
1960
Mr. Richard B. Hull
Executive Director
Telecommunications Center
The Ohio State University
2470 North Star Road
Columbus 21, Ohio
Dear Dick:
About Bob Davy â€” he worked for WHA for a year or
so as a student| doing announcing and writing a
news commentary for the School of the Air.
All of my recollections of Bob are plus and positive.
He's a fine gentleman, All-American boy type. He
has energy and enthusiasm and an appropriate set of
values with which to direct them. I recall that he
had ideas and ability to follow them through, working
independently.
Bob is a likeable chap, who gets along well with
others, and is a thoroughly agreeable sort that
allows him to fit in most anywhere.
I know nothing first hand of his competence as a TV
producer etc., though his record certainly looks
Impressive. I do know that you can count on him as
a person, as a man of integrity and idealism. And
when he says he has decided to go into ETV as the
place to "excell and work creatively and satisfyingly",
he sincerely means it.
Cordially,
William G. Harley
WGH:mem
P. S. Mac is very high on Bob,
WGH
